headline: Behind Berkshire’s Curtain: Is Greg Abel Preparing to Cut Davita Loose?
summary: Davita hit its 23rd new 52-week low on Tuesday. Its stock is now within a few dollars of trading in double digits. That’s not a good thing, given that its share price was nearly $180 a year ago.

raw.headline: Behind Berkshire’s Curtain: Is Greg Abel Preparing to Cut Davita Loose?

headline: FlexJobs Announces Top 100 Companies to Watch for Remote Jobs in 2026
summary: FlexJobs®, the work-from-home jobs site, announces the release of the Top 100 Companies to Watch for Remote Jobs in 2026. The 13th annual list is based on an analysis of approximately 60,000 companies and their remote job posting histories in the FlexJobs database between January 1 and December 31, 2025.

headline: UnitedHealthcare to Support Rural Hospitals with Accelerated Medicare Advantage Payments, Providing Immediate Cash-Flow Relief
summary: January 14, 2026--UnitedHealthcare today announced the launch of its Rural Payment Acceleration Pilot, a targeted initiative designed to support independent rural hospitals facing financial challenges.

raw.headline: UnitedHealthcare to Support Rural Hospitals with Accelerated Medicare Advantage Payments, Providing Immediate Cash-Flow Relief
raw.summary: January 14, 2026--UnitedHealthcare today announced the launch of its Rural Payment Acceleration Pilot, a targeted initiative designed to support independent rural hospitals facing financial challenges.

headline: UnitedHealthcare to pilot accelerated MA payments to rural hospitals
summary: The insurer will cut its MA payment timelines in half for select providers in Oklahoma, Idaho, Minnesota and Missouri in an effort to provide relief to rural hospitals.

raw.headline: UnitedHealthcare to pilot accelerated MA payments to rural hospitals
